story_30_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: No way! How the heck did I lose to you?!
story_30_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
...Bet that’s what you thought I was gonna say,
huh. But I’ve seen how much you’ve all grown.
story_30_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Guess I’ve gotta give it to you this time.
story_30_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’m feeling happy, sad, excited, upset... So many
emotions all at once!
story_30_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But above all that, there’s one thing I really,
really want to say to you all right now...
story_30_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’ll admit it—you guys are the real deal!
You’re good Trainers!
story_30_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Ladies and gentlemen, I present to you the first
ever champions of the Pokémon Masters League!
